title:
Flat surface state with octupole moment in an $e_g$ orbital system on a
  simple cubic lattice
abstract:
A tight-binding model for $e_g$ orbitals on a simple cubic lattice with
finite thickness is investigated. The hopping integrals for nearest-neighboring
sites are considered. We examine the electronic band structures for systems
with (001), (110), and (111) surfaces. Electronic states well localized around
the surfaces are found for the (110) and (111) surfaces. In particular, the
surface state is flat and extends in the entire Brillouin zone for the (111)
surface, provided the bulk band projected onto the surface Brillouin zone is
gapped. We also find that these surface states possess octupole moments in both
the (110) and (111) surface cases.
